roleset.name: make fuzzy, wooly, not having hard edges
roleset.note: FUZZ-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from fuzz.01-v)
FUZZY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8 (from fuzzy.01-j)

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is fuzzy

example.name: participle
example.text: The covers slid down his skinny neck so I saw his head , fuzzed like a dandelion gone to seed , but his face was turned [*-1] to the wall -- there was the pale shadow of his nose on the plaster -- and I thought , Well you do n't look much like a pig-drunk bully now .
example.arg: like a dandelion gone to seed

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: If she is still fuzzy - headed , we should probably go ahead and proceed to permanent pacing , which was discussed at length today , including a potential for bleeding , infection , cardiac and lung injury with pacemaker implantation .
